Identification.LongTitle: Order Specifying the Minimum Amount of Grain to Be Moved, No. 2

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Transport and the Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food, pursuant to subsection 116.2(2)a of the Canada Transportation Actb, makes the annexed Order Specifying the Minimum Amount of Grain to Be Moved, No. 2.

Subsection.Text: The minimum amount of grain that the Canadian National Railway Company and Canadian Pacific Railway Company must each move during the following periods is specified to be:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: 345 000 t a week for the period that begins on November 30, 2014 and ends on December 20, 2014;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: 200 000 t a week for the period that begins on December 21, 2014 and ends on January 3, 2015;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: 325 000 t a week for the period that begins on January 4, 2015 and ends on February 21, 2015;

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: 345 000 t a week for the period that begins on February 22, 2015 and ends on March 21, 2015; and

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: 465 000 t for the period that begins on March 22, 2015 and ends on March 28, 2015.

Subsection.Text: For the purposes of subsection (1), a week begins on Sunday and ends on the following Saturday.

Section.Text: This Order comes into force on the day on which it is registered.
